description: ​A critical Fluent Bit vulnerability that can be exploited in denial-of-service and remote code execution attacks impacts all major cloud providers and many technology giants. [...]
title: Critical Fluent Bit flaw impacts all major cloud providers

description: The California-based imaging sensors manufacturer OmniVision is warning of a data breach after the company suffered a Cactus ransomware attack last year. [...]
title: OmniVision discloses data breach after 2023 ransomware attack

description: Microsoft has announced a new AI-powered feature for Windows 11 called 'Recall,' which records everything you do on your PC and lets you search through your historical activities. [...]
title: Windows 11 Recall AI feature will record everything you do on your PC

description: A new version of the BiBi Wiper malware is now deleting the disk partition table to make data restoration harder, extending the downtime for targeted victims. [...]
title: New BiBi Wiper version also destroys the disk partition table

description: An extensive security audit of QNAP QTS, the operating system for the company's NAS products, has uncovered fifteen vulnerabilities of varying severity, with eleven remaining unfixed. [...]
title: QNAP QTS zero-day in Share feature gets public RCE exploit
